description.translate: Let us break this peace so quiet, that even the eternal mornings may fear us.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Fureur de Sôrän\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Brisons cette paix si tranquille, pour\"}","{\"text\":\"§7que même les matins éternels nous craignent.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Let us break this peace so quiet, that\"}","{\"text\":\"§7even the eternal mornings may fear us.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a2 §7SPD§a2 §7LUC§c-1\"}"],color:16514979}}
